statements: DELETE FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE route_id = 101 AND collection_status = 'Scheduled';
DELETE FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE collection_date = '2022-08-10' AND collection_area = 'Downtown'
DELETE FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE route_id = 101 AND collection_status = 'Completed'
DELETE FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE pickup_area = 'Residential' AND collection_date = '2022-08-01';
DELETE FROM WasteManagementLocation WHERE location_name = 'Recycling Center';
DELETE FROM GarbageCollectionWorker WHERE worker_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM WorkerAssignment WHERE schedule_id IN (SELECT schedule_id FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE schedule_date < '2022-01-01');
